org.apache.logging.log4j.message

类 ReusableObjectMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.message.ReusableObjectMessage
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, Message, ReusableMessage, StringBuilderFormattable

    public class ReusableObjectMessage
extends Object
implements ReusableMessage
    Mutable Message wrapper around an Object message.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.6
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

        public Object[] swapParameters(Object[] emptyReplacement)

      • getParameterCount

        public short getParameterCount()
        This message does not have any parameters so this method always returns zero.

      • memento

        public Message memento()
        从接口复制的说明: ReusableMessage
        Returns an immutable snapshot of the current internal state of this reusable message. The returned snapshot will not be affected by subsequent modifications of this reusable message.
        指定者:
        memento 在接口中 ReusableMessage
        返回:
        an immutable snapshot of this message
